original_text: “Now then, your two sons born to you in Egypt before I came to you here will be reckoned as mine; Ephraim and Manasseh will be mine, just as Reuben and Simeon are mine.
korean_text: 내가 애굽으로 와서 네게 이르기 전에 애굽에서 네가 낳은 두 아들 에브라임과 므낫세는 내 것이라 르우벤과 시므온처럼 내 것이 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: your two sons born to you in Egypt
before I came to you here
Ephraim and Manasseh will be mine
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임과 므낫세는 내 것이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: just as Reuben and Simeon are mine
